Title: Relates to licensed private career schools with gross tuition of less than one hundred thousand dollars
Summary: Relates to licensed private career schools with gross tuition of less than one hundred thousand dollars; authorizes certain licensed private career schools to file an unaudited financial statement under certain circumstances.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to licensed private career schools with gross tuition of less than one hundred thousand dollars; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
